select
from SALE where SKTNO = #{sktno,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and STATUS>0 AND ROWNUM=1 order by jlbh desc

update SALE
JYSJ = #{jysj,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
JZRQ = #{jzrq,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
